tachyon.worker

Interface DataServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyDataServer, NIODataServer

    public interface DataServer
extends Closeable
    Defines how to interact with a server running the data protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DataServer.Factory

      String getBindHost()
      Get the actual bind hostname on DataServer service.
      int getPort()
      Gets the port the DataServer is listening on.
      boolean isClosed()
      Check if the DataServer is closed.
